title: Update Property Owner Contact Information
description: A property owner has a new phone number. They've emailed the property manager to update their file.

tasks.description: Receive the email from the property owner with their new contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the owner and their new phone number.

tasks.description: Update the owner's profile in the property management software with the new phone number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the contact record.

tasks.description: Send a confirmation email back to the owner stating that their information has been updated.
